title: Fable.Anniversary.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Fable.Anniversary.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release Info:


Release year : 2014
Genre : RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Lionhead Studios
Publisher : Microsoft
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: ALI213



System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor : Intel Core2 Duo 2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 x2 2.4GHz
Memory : 3 GB
Video Card : Radeon X1800 / Nvidia GeForce 7600GT
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 6.94 GB


Game information:

Fable Anniversary - is a remake of one of the best-selling
role-playing games released on the original Xbox. This project
has forced players to believe that their every action will
affect the subsequent gameplay. And the world of Albion so
much fond of players that Fable has grown to the extent of
the whole franchise, the history of which has been going
on for almost 10 years.

Fable Anniversary has made great technological step up from
the original. In the present embodiment, the HD-game looks
and sounds amazing. This remake certainly impress both old
fans and newcomers alike.

This adventure role-playing game will present you full control
over your hero. Depending on the performed actions will change
his skills, appearance, and reputation. Create your own life
story, from his early years, when he was still an inexperienced
fighter, which has the potential to become the most powerful
being in the world. Choose the path of justice, or dedicate
your life to evil. And do not forget to hide the
chickens - Jack Blades returned.

Thanks to new textures and 3D-models, redesigned interface and
lighting system, as well as the "AchievementÃ‚Â», Fable Anniversary
gives devoted fans and newcomers the most
complete game experience in Fable.


Game Features:

Fully restored HD-graphics and sound
Support Steam-achievement
Completely new user interface and the system saves


Repack Features:

Fable Anniversary
Version of the game - v1.0
Do not cut / recoded
Additions :
Scythe Content Pack
Heroes and Villains Content Pack
